item.title: The Seagate Dockstar: A Very Cool Linux Device
item.description: What if I told you there was a computer out there, a small one, with gigabit ethernet, 4 USB 2.0 ports, runs on 5 watts, and serves as a great NAS (network attached storage) for your home.Â It can share files, serve media, be a router, make backups for you, host a lamp stack, be a mail server, etc. It can do whatever you can think up. How much would you pay for such a neat little device?
